title: Colin - AI Phone Assistants
description: Colin AI allows you to build your own AI phone assistants, that interact like humans. The specialized conversational pathways optimize the quality of the conversation and make it sound like a real human. The system can be integrated with CRM systems, Shopify and other data sources to improve the knowledge of your assistant and automate internal processes. Repetitive tasks like order status calls or bookings can be automated using Colin AI.
